reviewtext: this  cord is about 4' long.  I am using this on a desktop at work and its useless since the plug is on the back of the pc.(my old headphones had a cord at least 2x as long)if you use a laptop or phone, it will work for you, but not for any desktop with plug in the back.the sound is good. for the price.
summary: the cord is way to short  (4')
